idea: Turtles exhibit a significant range in size, with weights varying from as little as 5 ounces to as much as 1500 pounds and lengths from 5 inches to over 7 feet.

quote: On land, most turtles can only walk 3 to 4 miles per hour, but some species can swim up to 22 miles per hour!

idea: In Connecticut, the four turtles identified as being of special concern are the Spotted Turtle, the Wood Turtle, the Diamond-Backed Terrapin, and the Box Turtle.
